fields.name: Excellent Blood (C1)
fields.value: The CRIT Rate of Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG against enemies affected by the Cold or Frozen status effects is increased by 15%.

fields.name: Never-Ending Performance (C2)
fields.value: Every time Glacial Waltz defeats an enemy, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

fields.name: Dance of Frost (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Frostgnaw by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Frozen Kiss (C4)
fields.value:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

fields.name: Frostbiting Embrace (C5)
fields.value:
Increase the Level of Glacial Waltz by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Glacial Whirlwind (C6)
fields.value: Glacial Waltz will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

description: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.
title: Kaeya
